title: Denis Zhukovskiy
text:
Denis Yuryevich Zhukovskiy (; born 19 July 1980) is a former <a href="Russia">Russia</a>n professional <a href="Association%20football">football</a> player. 
Club career.
A product of <a href="FC%20Yelets">FC Yelets</a>' youth system, Zhukovskiy began his professional career playing for the club in the <a href="Russian%20Second%20Division">Russian Second Division</a> before joining local rivals <a href="FC%20Metallurg%20Lipetsk">FC Metallurg Lipetsk</a> where he played in the <a href="Russian%20Football%20National%20League">Russian Football National League</a> and Russian Second Division.
